intro: Agathosma stilbeoides, commonly known as African germander, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Rutaceae and is characterized by its aromatic, small, greenish-yellow flowers. The plant has narrow, linear leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in rocky or sandy habitats. Agathosma stilbeoides is valued for its medicinal properties and is used in traditional African medicine.
